text: Wołodko is a Polish-language surname. The surname is derived from the given name Wolodko, a diminutive from "Wołodimierz". Russian and Ukrainian languages equivalent: Volodko, Belarusian: Valadzko. Notable people with this surname include: *Stanisław Wołodko (born 1950), Polish athlete *Weronika Wołodko (born 1998), Polish women's volleyball player Category:Polish-language surnames
title: Wołodko
